content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: DisableAdvancedRule path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/waf/v1alpha/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/advanced_rules/{rule_id}/disable content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name ruleid
desc a waf rule id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum disable an advanced rule
desc blockcallout

  type danger
  body this is an alpha api call and should be considered very unstable please do not execute this in a production environment see our versioning guidelinesdocversioning for more information

/block
responses
title: 2_Advanced Rules_DisableAdvancedRule_5.json
